errors.error_description: The link to the dependency file is incorrect; it points to a non-existent `requirements.txt` file instead of the correct `setup.cfg`.
correction_candidates: Dependencies and minimal versions are listed in the `setup <https://github.com/skrub-data/skrub/blob/main/setup.cfg#L27>`_ file.
Dependencies and minimal versions are listed in the `pyproject.toml <https://github.com/skrub-data/skrub/blob/main/pyproject.toml>`_ file.
Dependencies and minimal versions are listed in the `environment.yml <https://github.com/skrub-data/skrub/blob/main/environment.yml>`_ file.
Dependencies and minimal versions are listed in the `setup.py <https://github.com/skrub-data/skrub/blob/main/setup.py>`_ file.
errors.golden_answer: Dependencies and minimal versions are listed in the `setup <https://github.com/skrub-data/skrub/blob/main/setup.cfg#L27>`_ file.
